Query.Sentence: WITH PUBLIC_COUNT AS ( SELECT c.COMP_ID, c.COMP_NAME, c.COMP_DESCRIPTION, c.COMP_ISPUBLIC, count(uc.USER_) AS NUM_USERS, COUNT(UC.USER_) > 10 AS COMPLETE FROM COMPETITIONS c INNER JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS uc ON c.COMP_ID = uc.COMP_ID WHERE c.COMP_ISPUBLIC = true GROUP BY c.COMP_ID HAVING COUNT(UC.USER_) < 10) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM PUBLIC_COUNT #WHERE# #ORDER#;

WITH COMP_BY_ID AS (SELECT C.COMP_ID, UC.USER_, UC.UC_ID, C.COMP_NAME, UC.UC_AVAILABLE_MONEY, c.COMP_DESCRIPTION, c.COMP_CODE FROM COMPETITIONS C LEFT JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS UC ON C.COMP_ID = UC.COMP_ID) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM COMP_BY_ID #WHERE# #ORDER#;

SELECT C.COMP_ID, C.COMP_NAME, UC.USER_, UC.UC_ID, UC.UC_AVAILABLE_MONEY, c.COMP_DESCRIPTION, c.COMP_CODE, sum(RP.RP_POINTS) as TOTAL_POINTS FROM COMPETITIONS C LEFT JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS UC ON C.COMP_ID = UC.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS_PILOTS UCP ON UCP.UC_ID = UC.UC_ID LEFT JOIN RACES_POINTS RP ON RP.UCP_ID = UCP.UCP_ID #WHERE# GROUP BY UC.USER_, C.COMP_ID, UC.UC_AVAILABLE_MONEY, UC.UC_ID #ORDER#;

WITH RANKING AS ( SELECT C.COMP_ID, UC.USER_, C.COMP_NAME, RC.RAC_ROUND, sum(RP.RP_POINTS) as TOTAL_POINTS, RP.RP_POINTS, P.PIL_SURNAME FROM COMPETITIONS C LEFT JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS UC ON C.COMP_ID = UC.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS_PILOTS UCP ON UCP.UC_ID = UC.UC_ID LEFT JOIN RACES_POINTS RP ON RP.UCP_ID = UCP.UCP_ID LEFT JOIN RESULTS R ON R.RES_ID = RP.RES_ID LEFT JOIN RACES RC ON RC.RAC_ID = R.RAC_ID LEFT JOIN PILOTS P ON P.PIL_ID = UCP.PIL_ID WHERE RC.RAC_ROUND IS NOT NULL GROUP BY UC.USER_, C.COMP_ID, RC.RAC_ROUND, RP.RP_POINTS, P.PIL_SURNAME ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM RANKING #WHERE# #ORDER#;

WITH RANKING AS ( SELECT C.COMP_ID, UC.USER_, C.COMP_NAME, RC.RAC_ROUND, sum(RP.RP_POINTS) as TOTAL_POINTS FROM COMPETITIONS C LEFT JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS UC ON C.COMP_ID = UC.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS_PILOTS UCP ON UCP.UC_ID = UC.UC_ID LEFT JOIN RACES_POINTS RP ON RP.UCP_ID = UCP.UCP_ID LEFT JOIN RESULTS R ON R.RES_ID = RP.RES_ID LEFT JOIN RACES RC ON RC.RAC_ID = R.RAC_ID WHERE RC.RAC_ROUND IS NOT NULL GROUP BY UC.USER_, C.COMP_ID, RC.RAC_ROUND ORDER BY RC.RAC_ROUND ASC ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM RANKING #WHERE# #ORDER#;

WITH AVAIL_MONEY AS (SELECT C.COMP_ID, C.COMP_NAME, UC.USER_, UC.UC_ID, UC.UC_AVAILABLE_MONEY, c.COMP_DESCRIPTION, c.COMP_CODE FROM COMPETITIONS C LEFT JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS UC ON C.COMP_ID = UC.COMP_ID) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM AVAIL_MONEY #WHERE# #ORDER#;
